title: Working with the community for the rehabilitation of legacy mines: Approaches and lessons learned from the literature
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 98

Author(s): Dennis Alonzo, Carlito Baltazar Tabelin, Irish Mae Dalona, Jan Michael Vincent Abril, Arnel Beltran, Aileen Orbecido, Mylah Villacorte-Tabelin, Vannie Joy Resabal, Michael Angelo Promentilla, Marlon Suelto, Pablo R. Brito-Parada, Yves Plancherel, Anne D. Jungblut, Robin Armstrong, Ana Santos, Paul F. Schofield, Richard Herrington
